message.name: RADIO_STATUS_EXTENSIONS
message.description: Additional link information for digital radios.
message.field: Local (message sender) recieved signal strength indication in decibels.
Local (message sender) signal to noise ratio in decibels.
Local (message sender) Modulation Coding Scheme index. This index uniquely describes the combination of number of spatial streams, modulation type and coding scheme.
Local (message sender) number of spatial streams.
Local (message sender) number of packets in buffer.
Local (message sender) percentage of time the radio is transmitting.

message.name: IMG_DETECTION_2D
message.description: Contains information on an object detection in a video stream or frame. This message can be used to annotate individual video frames in systems where the detection algorithm and video playback run in different modules. This message can be sent by A) the system running the detection algorithm to display the object annotation on the playback device or B) the playback device to indicate that this object shall be tracked. Note that the video frame ID must uniquely identify the same frame on all receiving devices.
message.field: Local (message sender) system time.
Unique ID specifiying the video frame in the message sender video stream.
Unique ID specifiying the class of the object.
Unique ID representing the object.
Time to live: If this time has elapsed since last update, the object should be deleted on the receiver side. A value of 0 should indicate no timeout.
Boolean indicating wether this object should be tracked or not.
Confidence score in the range of [0.0, 1,0] for the classifcation.
Relative image x coordinate (left to right axis) in the range of [0.0, 1,0] describing the top left corner of the bounding box .
Relative image y coordinate (top to bottom axis) in the range of [0.0, 1,0] describing the top left corner of the bounding box.
Relative image x coordinate (left to right axis) in the range of [0.0, 1,0] describing the bottom right corner of the bounding box.
Relative image y coordinate (top to bottom axis) in the range of [0.0, 1,0] describing the bottom left corner of the bounding box.
Latitude in WGS84 coordinate frame of the detected object. NAN if unknown.
Longitude in WGS84 coordinate frame of the detected object. NAN if unknown.
Altitude in EGM96 coordiante frame of the detected object. NAN if unknown.
North velocity of the object. NAN if unknown.
East velocity of the object. NAN if unknown.
Down velocity of the object. NAN if unknown.
